title: WINTER 2015-2016 Internship - Pro Sports
text: Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Assist in community relations initiatives; generate ideas and programs that increase the teamÂ’s overall impact in the community.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
